reviews.review:
Can u plese create russian servers for russian players they are anoying on mm.
But very good game

I recommend csgo if you play with a small group or comp team other then that play norms for fun or unistall after that becasue solo comp has tons of hackers from my experience. Also even if you do find a game in Ranked Comp mode and you do ok or less then ok you just get trashed on by your team. Then all you can do is retaliate in chat, frag your own tool bag teammate or just ignore them... either way this game is starting to feel more and more like a game for small groups of friends or high level pro play other then that I could see Csgo Dying off at some point just like WOW and Activision Blizzard.

where do i even start. The Graphics AMAZING. The online presence is by far the best in any online game i have yet played, we really are like a big happy family screaming over the dinner table. I haven't yet been able to find a game that satisfies my needs more than counter strike does. It even works better than my Girlfriend. ;) all in all 10/10 game :))))
